title: 求RPGitem插件1.7.10可用
author: Star、星零
txt_content: 如题所述，BBS里的搜索看的眼花缭乱，只能求助了

replies.author: 白毛巾
replies.txt_content:
RPG帖子：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 3D2290%26sortid%3D7

直接下载地址：https://github.com/NyaaCat/RPGit ... Gitems-reloaded.jar

望采纳

replies.author: lsz7575
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 3D2290%26sortid%3D7

去他git下载  3.5.106版本的

https://github.com/NyaaCat/RPGit ... Gitems-reloaded.jar

replies.author: LINCHUTI
replies.txt_content:
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1o7Dk1Iy
RPGitem并没有1.7.10
但1.7.2可以在1.7.10使用

replies.author: xianzai现在
replies.txt_content: rpgitem比较难设置而且不适合1.7.10 推荐你用itemlorestats

replies.author: q211316907
replies.txt_content:
插件下载地址http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... p;highlight=rpgitem
